name: ThinkingCapSpanish
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: thinking cap spanish
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Start from zero and learn to speak Spanish! 

With Thinking Cap Spanish you can learn how to speak Spanish and begin having conversations from day 1. 

Start talking Spanish as you take a walk together with Caperucita Roja (a.k.a Little Red Riding Hood) in the enchanted forest of languages. Learn phrases via hilarious conversations with Lobo Feroz (a.k.a. the Big Bad Wolf), El Hombre de Jengibre (a.k.a. the Gingerbread Man) and other inhabitants of the enchanted forest. On the way, earn gold coins and buy valuable items that help the heroes on their journey. 

Fun and engaging with great results for any age!

Educators - discover our classroom resources:
https://www.thinkingcapinnovations.com/thinkingcapspanish
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
